resources.string:
Hello everyone! 
 My name is Anastasia Drogunova. I am working as neiropsychologist and ontogenetic kinesitherapist with children with ASD about 8 years. 
 One of my dreams is making good and usefull apps for my students. This why I started to learn mobileDev. 
 This is my first app, so be kindfull for me please =) 
 Also I have youtube channel: AutismSpectrumChannel. You can write me to my FB profile (all links below)
